description: Make this colourful pasta salad recipe ahead of time and take it to work for lunch. The balsamic dressing brings all the Mediterranean flavours together.
name: Mediterranean-Inspired Pasta Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300 g Woolworths microwave quick spiral pasta
1 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Divide dressing between 2 x 400ml jars. Layer pasta, capsicum and half of the rocket into jars. Roughly crumble in feta, then add onion, tomato, remaining rocket and pepitas. Seal with lids and refrigerate until ready to serve.
